tool_description: Analyzes incident details and classifies the incident type, severity level, and priority for investigation based on workplace safety standards.

injuries_occurred.description: Whether injuries occurred during the incident

error_messages: Missing incident description: Provide a detailed description of at least 20 characters.
Invalid injury status: injuries_occurred must be true or false.
Classification error: Unable to determine incident type from provided description.
usage: Provide incident_description and injuries_occurred status, optionally specify property_damage. The tool will analyze the incident and return classification details including type, severity, and investigation priority.

incident_type.description: Classified type of incident (e.g., slip/fall, equipment failure, chemical exposure)

investigation_priority.description: Priority level for investigation (routine, urgent, immediate)

regulatory_reportable.description: Whether this incident requires regulatory reporting
